## Recording Movies

3. Rotate the shutter speed dial to **A**.

   !Shutter Speed Dial

   *AUTO will appear in the display.*

   !AUTO Display

4. Rotate the sensitivity dial to **A**.

   !Sensitivity Dial

5. Rotate the focus mode selector to **C**.

   !Focus Mode Selector

> ⚠️ To use the shutter speed and sensitivity dials, press the dial lock release and rotate the dial to the desired setting.

> 📘 These settings can also be adjusted using touch controls (see page 28).
